item.description:
Directions below

Chill out, watch a movie, socialize, eat pizza, yummy chocolates, and more.

Pat will supply the pizza. You bring what you want to drink, a side dish or your favorite chocolates to share.

Movie TBD at a later date by consensus (I promise, not a "chick" flick).

Let's enjoy each other's company and make new friends

Directions will be sent out as the date gets closer.

Joint event with "Spice of Life too short"

Directions to Pat's house in Belchertown

Route 9 from Amherst:
Go thru lights at Mobil stations and stay on 9 east
Take a left at the blinking yellow light (Old Enfield Road)
Take a left at Allen Road
2nd house on the left - #15 Allen Road

Route 9 from Ware:
Make a right at the blinking yellow light onto Old Enfield Road
Take a left at Allen Road
2nd house on the left - #15 Allen Road

Route 202 south of Belchertown:
Follow 202 to the center of Belchertown
Go straight thru the lights at the common
At the bottom of the hill, make a left at Route 9 West
Go to blinking red light
Go thru intersection onto Old Enfield Road
Take a left at Allen Road
2nd house on the left - #15 Allen Road

Route 181 from Palmer:
When you get to common in Belchertown, make a right and go down the hill
At the bottom of the hill, make a left at Route 9 West
Go to blinking red light
Go thru intersection onto Old Enfield Road
Take a left at Allen Road
2nd house on the left - #15 Allen Road

If you get lost, call Pat's cell phone: 413-374-3289.
item.name: Movie - Social - Pizza - Chocolates - at Pat's house in Belchertown
